alert.note: Alert for Harrison; Marion (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 28 at 9:33PM CDT until April 28 at 10:15PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Marion County in northeastern Texas... Northeastern Harrison County in northeastern Texas... * Until 1015 PM CDT. * At 932 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Woodlawn, or 9 miles north of Marshall, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Jefferson, Smithland, Karnack, Woodlawn and Nesbitt. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
